params.dai_: dai contract used in Uniswap v3 Pairs
params.weth_: Weth contract used in Uniswap v3 Pairs

flashFee(address,uint256).details: From ERC-3156. The fee to be charged for a given loan.

returns._0: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

flashLoan(address,address,uint256,bytes).details: From ERC-3156. Loan `amount` tokens to `receiver`, which needs to return them plus fee to this contract within the same transaction.

params.receiver: The contract receiving the tokens, needs to implement the `onFlashLoan(address user, uint256 amount, uint256 fee, bytes calldata)` interface.
params.userData: A data parameter to be passed on to the `receiver` for any custom use.

getPairAddress(address).details: Get the Uniswap Pair that will be used as the source of a loan. The opposite token will be Weth, except for Weth that will be Dai.

returns._0: The Uniswap V3 Pair that will be used as the source of the flash loan.

maxFlashLoan(address).details: From ERC-3156. The amount of currency available to be lended.

returns._0: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.
